snippet: An operation covering all 50 states centered on illegal immigrants convicted of felonies or those who have repeatedly entered the nation illegally.
abstract: Federal agents from the Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency, in a six-day nationwide sweep, arrest 3,168 immigrants who have been convicted of felonies or have repeatedly entered the United States illegally.
lead_paragraph: An operation covering all 50 states centered on illegal immigrants convicted of felonies or those who have repeatedly entered the nation illegally.

headline.print_headline: Immigration Agency Arrests 3,168 in Six-Day Sweep Across U.S.
